Kim Jong who? Wang Lei, from Nanjing, Jiangsu Province is such a big fan of the North Korean dictator that he has undergone plastic surgery to look more like him

The real deal: North Korean leader Kim Jong-Un and his wife Ri Sol-Ju pictured arriving for the 2014 Combat Flight Contest in Pyongyan last May

A Chinese man has undergone plastic surgery to look like North Korean dictator Kim Jong-Un.Wang Lei is the spitting image of the 32-year-old 'Dear Leader' of North Korea, and has reportedly gone under the knife to enhance his likeness.He was caught by photographers in Nanjing, capital of east Chinaâ€™s Jiangsu Province, after bumping into a fellow plastic surgery lover - and going on a date.Wang Lei met Liu Zixuan, an actress based in Nanjing, at a plastic surgery clinic when she went for a check-up following a breast enlargement.The couple discovered their mutual interest in artificial body alterations and arranged to go on a gold date - inviting photographers to come along.
